name: Dirty Apron Café
description: A boutique café situated in the Grade II listed arches of the Deptford Station Ramp which provided access for the London & Greenwich Railway; London’s first railway line. The café has cosy interior seating in the arches or outside seating in the Market Yard. Enjoy great quality Breakfast, Lunch or Dinner options; along with lovely hot or cold beverages and cocktails served by friendly and welcoming staff. Delivery options are also available (Check the Menu Notice for details) so you can also enjoy café food at home.
